articles.title: Lionel Messi, Argentina through to Copa America Final with win on penalties over Colombia - Barca Blaugranes
articles.description: A dramatic victory for the Albiceleste and a date set with Brazil for the title
articles.content: Lionel Messi and Argentina had to suffer, but they are through to the Copa America Final and will face Brazil at the Maracanã thanks to a 3-2 win on penalties over Colombia after a thrilling 1-1 draw… [+1748 chars]

articles.title: Biden admin launching 'door-to-door' push to vaccinate Americans, sparks major backlash - Fox News
articles.description: The Biden administration is launching a new "door-to-door" effort to vaccinate Americans after falling short of its Fourth of July goal of having 70 percent of the adult population with at least one shot of the coronavirus vaccine.
